metadata.title: CVE-2024-12431 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 15.5 before 17.5.5, 17.6 before 17.6.3, and 17.7 before 17.7.1, inwhich unauthorized users could manipulate the status of issues in publicprojects.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
